message: Does anyone know of a gem that analyzes your current iTunes library, and has the ability to see most played songs/artists, etc?
Also, just found this https://gist.github.com/508415 perhaps it helps a little
@C_t_Montgomery if it helps, try this: https://gist.github.com/983143 it wont be fast.. but it'll map the xml data into an array of hashes, each hash representing a track

Not sure if there's a gem for this, but I just generally open up Music/iTunes/iTunes Music Library.xml and parse the XML using Nokogiri. Although I doubt that provides count for songs/artists for how many times their tracks have been played
That's awesome. Thank you, @inkjet. I appreciate it and will look into doing that!
nice to see other than me who writes @inkjet (instead of @injekt)!
@C_t_Montgomery You're welcome. Your thanks to me will be writing injekt next time and only using inkjet when @Judofyr is not around :)
